author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

Allowing all Phase2 geometries for Patatrack wfs. The new wfs will inherit then the numbering `23634.*` and `23834.*` (no PU, PU). Adding also the various `FullRecoGPU` wfs for Phase2 (e.g. `.582`, `.592`, ...).

#### PR validation:

None. Technical PR. Testing the new wfs.
title: Adding all geometries and the FullRecoGPU for Patatrack wfs for Phase2
